com.tsp.models

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsp.models.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains three methods (getInputName(), initialize() and showHand()), setters and getters for the attributes.
    Since:
    10/05/2015
    Version:
    3.0.0

    Ramzi Sellami , Saurabh Sharma
